TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void DataGridItemEventHandler(object sender, DataGridItemEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed DataGridItemEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub DataGridItemEventHandler(sender As Object, e As DataGridItemEventArgs)
public delegate void DataGridItemEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, DataGridItemEventArgs ^ e);
type DataGridItemEventHandler = delegate of obj * DataGridItemEventArgs -> unit

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示处理 控件的 和 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that handles the and events of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当创建控件中的项时，将引发事件 。The event is raised when an item in the control is created. 当控件中的项 绑定到数据源时，将引发事件。The event is raised when an item in the control is bound to a data source. 创建 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为事件指定和编写处理程序， 以显示在控件中创建项的顺序 。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to display the order in which items are created in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic DataGridItemEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridItemEventArgs Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic DataGridItemEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridItemEventArgs Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[DataGridItemDataBound#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridItemDataBound/CS/datagriditemdataboundcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataGridItemDataBound#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridItemDataBound/VB/datagriditemdataboundvb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[DataGridItemDataBound2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridItemDataBound2/CS/datagriditemdatabound2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataGridItemDataBound2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridItemDataBound2/VB/datagriditemdatabound2vb.aspx#1)]
